item.description:
Yes its last minute, I thought about doing Gloria's walk
But i also miss the sunsets...did we even have a sunset this week at all ??

So this is not much of a walk to the top...
its just a another social event which is back for its pleasant atmosphere of talking, excersizing, and enjoying a mixture of snacks and beverages while sitting atop the mountains and watching the sun as it is setting..
You can bring what you want, i like bringing cheeze and a bottle of white zinfindel and other snacks to share.
Those who dont drink can bring sparkling anything..
its either the wine, people, or place that makes it pleasant.
Ok enough of the subliminal enticement to get you to a nice location..
It is a relatively short walk of light hiking to the top of the little hill...
Im not going to tell you what your visual reward is going to be a top ..ya just have to go to see it....so there.

Yeh you have to work a bit for your reward....its worth it..
we take our time...no hurry...
besides its all down hill on the way out....


Getting There:


From Hartford take Interstate 84, take Exit 60 (Manchester-East Hartford). take a left ...The route is 44 Burnside Ave heading to East Hartford..The park begins about 500 feet west of the exit but DO NoT use the gate.
WE WILL MEET on the side of the road (Vernon Road) between the MARCO POLO RESTARUANT and the "hill"... about 3/4 miles down from that exit, just past the hill. you will see a citgo station and mack donalds to the left and marco polo restaurant on the right...
The park "hill" will be in view from there,,

From Vernon/Rockville
Im not sure exactly what exit number but as best i know of its the one that goes to the mall but its the one 3 miles before rte 44...Please look at your maps first...

Vernon Street, East hartford is the destination..

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Wine and Cheeze Sunset Observation on top of Wickham Park, East Hartford Side
